channel.title: Code to prevent Pking between same IP. [DELTA]
channel.description:
hey im looking for a code that prevents pking between the same ip address, can anyone help me with this? i tried manipulating the code for no trading between same ip but i couldn't manage to do it...
its for a delta base btw, thanks.

item.title: Code to prevent Pking between same IP. [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @owwch_u_died owwch u died
item.description:
@owwch_u_died wrote:

Go into client.java in source. This works for 317 and maybe a couple more versions.

if(killerz.isclangame == false) {
if(killerz.connectedFrom.equals(connectedFrom) && connectedFrom.equals(killerz.connectedFrom)) {
killerz.sM(“Multiple IP detected, you will not recieve any points or title.”);
} else {
killerz.pkpoints += 1;
killerz.sM(“You have killed “+playerName+”, you now have “+killerz.pkpoints+” PvPP.”);
}
} else {
}

and/or this:

if(killerz.playerId != playerId) {

if(killerz.lastKill == playerId) {
killerz.sM(“Repeating or false kill detected, you will not recieve any points or title.”);
} else {

Just look for “playername” in java and find a spot thats appropriate

Read full topic
